page.title: 15Small Businesses
page.content: Most employment in the area is agricultural but a few small businesses operate. In Stibbard there are two builders,R.Bunting and Son, and A. Shreeve. Mr.N. Curson runs a light haulage business carrying sand, shingle and other small loads. A few metres east of Stibbard crossroads an old Barn has been renovated and operates as Brickfield Barn Woodwork, specialising in hand made furniture and churchwork. Mrs. Susan Yaxley prints local history pamphlets and headed notepaper on a small home press. There is also a Master Saddler, Geoffrey Gibson, and a Painter and Decorator, Brian Mann.
